channel.title: Smart Connections & Smart Connect Documentation
channel.description: Last 10 notes on Smart Connections & Smart Connect Documentation

item.title: Smart Environments in Smart Connect
item.description: 1. Overview Smart Environments are a core component of the Smart Connect app. They define the connection between your notes and the AI, specifying which notes are accessible and how they are processed.

item.title: Smart Actions in Smart Connect
item.description: 1. Overview Smart Actions allow you to define how the AI interacts with your notes by specifying the operations it can perform. They are crucial for managing workflows and customizing AI behavior to suit your specific needs.

item.title: Settings in Smart Connect
item.description: 1. Overview The Settings section allows you to configure global preferences, security options, and other important aspects of the Smart Connect app. This includes managing your connection to the Smart Connect Official Service, adjusting security settings, monitoring performance and token usage, and utilizing debugging tools to maintain optimal functionality.

item.title: Custom Actions
item.description: What are custom actions? ‚ÄúCustom Actions empower you to execute local functions with unparalleled ease, bypassing the complexities of server hosting. Simplify your development workflow and boost productivity with Smart Actions.‚Äù ‚ÄúCustom Actions make executing local functions as easy as flipping a switch.

item.title: Help debug Smart Connections issues
item.description: The steps necessary to help me debug an issue at start-up. make sure this setting in Obsidian is toggled on open the developer console logs (on windows: CTRL+SHIFT+i) Clear the logs: Disable & Re-enable Smart Connections Screenshot errors in the logs and send them to me for review.
